website_summaries.verdict: While its wireless connectivity can be hit-or-miss, this preamplifier features great tube sound in an attractive package.
pros: Has a pair of vacuum tubes for a retro tube sound
Sports an attractive design with the ability to switch between blue and orange tube lighting
Input options include RCA, USB, and Bluetooth
Ships with power cord, USB cable, and Bluetooth antenna
Volume and separate bass/treble controls included
cons: Some buyers report issues with Bluetooth connectivity

customer_reviews.title: Great little preamp
customer_reviews.text: Lovely little pre-amp. I combined this with a Nobsound TPA3116D2 Amp and a pair of Polk T15 Bookshelf Loudspeakers. The Bluetooth feature sucks, being nearly 9db down in sensitivity compared to the line-in. Come on designers, at least bump it up on par with the RCA line-in. The change to GE JAN 5654W tubes makes a significant improvement in warmth, although the original tubes ain’t half-bad either. Price-point is great and cosmetics are handsome. This setup fulfills its intended application very well.
customer_reviews.author: Cletus Berkeley

customer_reviews.title: Great value to improve a desk top PC audio, with a flavor of vacuum tubes
customer_reviews.text: This unit works as promised. I tested USB, bluetooth, and line inputs and send the output to a pair of powered computer speakers. The wire input works the best because I used a DAC that's better than the built-in DAC in this preamp. The USB and BT worked adequately in my opinion. I tried upgraded tubes (GE 5654W). They sound a bit better than the stock tube. Real HIFi fans probably won't take this too seriously. But I think this makes significantly improvement if you try to invest <$500 to improve the desk PC audio experience.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Great for saving space - replaces 4 devices with 1
customer_reviews.text: This is a real winner. It replaces 4 of my devices with a single one, which is super convenient. Previously, I had a USB DAC (for the computer), a bluetooth receiver (for ipad), an RCA switcher (for switching between 3 inputs), and I was in the market for a preamp (to boost the bass of my open-back headphones). Everything worked out of the box. My PC had no trouble connecting via USB. The bluetooth works great with ipad - it even connects bluetooth automatically when I turn it on (my previous bluetooth receiver didn't do this). Regarding sound quality, I have no complaints. However, my bar is pretty low. As long as it doesn't hiss, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: babymastodon

customer_reviews.title: Sounds GREAT with Russian 6Ж1n-EB tubes.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered some 6Ж1n-EB tubes from Moscow to replace the ones that came with the unit. They definitely improved the tone. The 6Ж1n-EB tubes (Vostok Rocket Tubes) added more bass and a little crispness to the treble. With my AKG K712s just sound crazy good with this amp. Even better than my Sennheiser 650s and my planar magnetic HiFiman cans. Definitely recommended even without the tube change. The tubes that come with it are more than adequate and still sound really good. But get some 6Ж1n-EB off ebay if you really want this little preamp to realize its potential. Great work Douk Audio!
customer_reviews.author: Stonecutter

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I got this preamp for a recently acquired vintage Pioneer SX-737 used with a CD player and Bluetooth audio. Speakers are old KLH AV55 floor speakers and Klipsch R 41M's. Budget stereo but I'm getting more out of it with this P1. The stock tubes were good enough but $20.00 on some GE JAN 5654W is well worth doing. These tubes really opened up the sound stage, more clarity. Immediately noticeable. Look forward to more after they're burned in! This preamp has good control ability, and it sounds great right out of the box. It's a solid build and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: G. Higuera

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one of the best upgrades to my sound quality. I replaced the tubes for some russian ones and this thing sounds sweet. I plug this into my studio monitors and also use them for my good headphones and i also use the rca in to plug in my hdmi sound splitter. The controls are smooth the versatility of the different inputs is great. I would buy this again if it ever broke but looks well made. The stock tubes were good too but might as well go all out and upgrade. I dont use bluetooth so cant comment there.
customer_reviews.author: Tough customer (Arthur ref)

customer_reviews.title: ALL YOU NEED
customer_reviews.text: Work as design. Sound over USB much better then over Bluetooth. However i though aptx processor should sound much better. In overall you have everything you need in one unit. Run it with tube amplifier and sound great. I was willing reorder another one but unfortunately item no more available at amazon.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewS

customer_reviews.title: Compact audiophiliac wonder!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely limited in space, and I wanted to use my Bryston amp without having to have to use a stack of sorts. The Douk P1 is the ulmtimate solution. I use the DAC when I hook up my phone or laptop, and the bluetooth when streaming spotify. I upgraded to vintage match old stock GE 5654s, but honestly I couldn't tell a significant difference from the originals tubes. I split the RCA signal to hook up a Sunfire True Super Junior sub to round out my lower freqs. I'm crazy happy with the results! Uncompromised old school holographic sound without the cumbersome components :)
customer_reviews.author: Lemmor Amor

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and buy the Riverstone Audio 5654W's with it.
customer_reviews.text: With the original unit by itself, I was not very impressed. I have USB mode playing TIDAL MQA tracks and it just seemed... plain worse. I was starting to think the tube hype was a total scam. I read some comments saying the included tubes were decent enough. Before giving up, I tried an upgraded set and wow, night and day difference, I take everything back. DO YOURSELF A FAVOR AND DO NOT USE THE INCLUDED TUBES. My Stack is: P1 Douk Audio DAC/Tube, Fosi Audio MO-3 300w mono, and Nobsound A2 2x160w Stereo. Lovin it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiril B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Preamp!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This little guy provides rich bass and crisp mid-high notes with sheerness but no distortion or very little anyway. I don't have USB's on my laptop or I would use it through USB as it provides superior audio quality but with that said BT provides a fairly rich audio experience too. Have this plugged into a BluTube receiver and a pair of K41's. The sound quality is just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: pretty cool little unit
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Trying to add some volume and tone to my headphones while playing my drums. This unit really gives the volume a good boost and the ability to adjust tonally to bring out the parts I want to hear better. so far worth the buy. Looking forward to messing with the tubes and seeing what it does as a tube preamp for my powered speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning sound clarity!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Nakamichi headphones. (Needless to say they are amazing!) The sound quality is superb!. So I played a record thru my Technics MK1200s thru the "P1" thru the Nakamichi! the "P1" catches "EVERY" single tonality of the music and brings it forward to be heard on it's entirety.........Very satisfying!!! .....for lack of other words and sentiments! it's an incredible pre amp for the size!!!!! I'm very pleased with it.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this to enhance my 58XX headphones. They are not hi end head phones but when plugged into this little tube amp they do provide a richer warmer sound which i like. Violins, piano sax all have a rich sound. I was quite pleased. I recommend this product

customer_reviews.author: Shaun P.

customer_reviews.title: Must read!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Tends to get warm easily (tube styles like this may just get like that). Also have heard some negative things about the Bluetooth with this but what most people don’t know is that Bluetooth will naturally not sound as good as a line input so be aware of that (I don’t even use that on this product for that very reason alone). Other then that I very much do enjoy the product and hope that it lasts me a good many years. Would recommend this to a friend hands down!

customer_reviews.title: Nice little rig, sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: I like this little rig. The bluetooth on my Onkyo was a bit finicky so I figured I would give this a go instead of just getting another bluetooth adaptor. It definitely brightens up the music - the high are a little more crisp and detailed.

customer_reviews.title: Great tube preamp - tiny giant
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tube preamp/ headphone amp with a build-in USB DAC. The sound quality right out of the box is good (but a bit thin sounding). If you want to significantly improve the sound quality, get the matched GE vacuum tubes. With the GE tubes, the Douk will run cooler and the music will sound richer/fuller/warmer and with great clarity. A must In my opinion.

product_meta.title: P1 Bluetooth 5.0 Vacuum Tube Preamplifier Hi-Fi Valve Headphone Amplifier Wireless Receiver Audio Decoder Preamp USB DAC APTX
feature_bullets: P1 is a Bluetooth vacuum & valve tube preamplifier and headphone amplifier. Headphone output is 160mW @32Ω and is suitable for 32~300Ω headphones and headsets.
Classic 6J5 vacuum & valve tube can provide warm retro tube sound. It can be replaced by 6J1, 6J4, GE5654, 6AK5, 6Ж1n-EB.
It supports Bluetooth/USB/RCA inputs from various devices like iPod, Phone, MP3, TV, Blu-ray players, Echo Dot, CD players, computer etc.
Bluetooth 5.0 supports APT-X, APT-X LL lossless transmission. PC-USB supports 24bit 192KHz and is compatible with Windows/Mac/Linux system
Treble & bass control can achieve different sound style. Bypass function can suspend the tone control circuit to achieve purer music experience.
